content: https://privatekeys.pw/puzzles/10-btc-pineapple-puzzleI'm trying to solve some old bitcoin puzzles, does anyone know the answer to this one? If you give me the solution, maybe I'll give you something good? [$50]

comments.body: Quote from: digaran on October 10, 2023, 11:31:50 AMQuote from: chanchan11 on October 10, 2023, 07:49:44 AMhttps://privatekeys.pw/puzzles/10-btc-pineapple-puzzleI'm trying to solve some old bitcoin puzzles, does anyone know the answer to this one? Â However I might add, be careful not to go bankrupt Â because of this generosity offering $50, I mean come on man, the link says 10 BTC and you only want to share $50? LolÂ  you even say maybe you'd give us $50 meaning it's not guaranteed that we will get that payment.ðŸ˜…My thoughts too. At least the forum has enough space to accommodate whatever it is that's hiddeb in the privatekey link provided above. If really this was a problem that you're battling to solve, why not expatiate it here for us to help you. Must you have to make it look that you're also offering us a favor in return?Secondly, aside from the above-mentioned, it is not just every link you want visit, hence the essence why photo uploads are provided here to help you explain your poin better. How I also wish there are some automatic tools here in the forum that verify links, that will go a long way.Lastly, your level of uncertainty by adding a "Maybe" to the bucks you're offering will further disinterest other well meaning members here. I mean, there are a couple of generous experts here that could proffer a solution to your problem for free, but your statements could also easily chase them away.

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: The link is Ok to visit, but the problem is that pineapple puzzle has already been solved, so I don't know why OP wants it cracked when there is nothing in that address anymore? OP is there any alt coins in that puzzle address and you want them? If solution wasn't revealed by the solver, you'll have a hard time solving it.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: I was looking for the solution of the puzzle and couldn't find it, it looks like the one who solved it only took the coins and never shared how he did it. Even i asked to chat gpt but that AI has no clue about it. So, the puzzle was solved but no one posted the solution in the past.Maybe with the current hints you can find the solution, i will not even try, for $50 isn't worth it. But will keep an eye on this thread, would be nice to know the solution just out of curiosity.
